overview: A grimy junkyard becomes a fantasy playground when NINE muscled, young studs nakedly work, romp and play in a guy's ultimate dream job! These beefy boys strip more than cars, their lean, nude bodies glowing greasy and sweaty under the hot summer sun. Soon these frisky friends turn their down and dirty work into a bare blast of water fights, car climbing and tire wrestling.
title: Junkyard Boyz
